name: Your Little Paradise
description:
Description:

Your Little Paradise is a short story about not that usual school life.
You will play as a boy, with almost no friends, because his family is contantly moving from one city to another in attempts to find a job.
The game takes place in one of these cities, where your family decides to try to settle down. You don't expect anything special this time, but fate has other plans.

Features:
  • mystical romantic story
  • ~ half an hour gameplay
  • 5 characters
  • peaceful bgm
Plans:
  • ~ 2 hours gameplay
  • ~ 15 backgrounds (Currently all the background are taken from the internet)
  • ~ 10 characters
